title: (x) Cafepress.com - Myriad, ITC Officina Sans {Franz, Yves, Adriano S}
content:
Hi everyone!   
Does somebody know the typefaces used for the "About Us" (title) and "At CafePress.com, we're..." (header) texts under the address " [http://www.cafepress.com/cp/info/about/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524125658/http:/www.cafepress.com/cp/info/about/)"? Thanks a lot for replies!
author: cbalioglu

comments.content: That's the third time in a row that Yves beats me... I must be going senile ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524125658im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif) ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524125658im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif) ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524125658im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
Aw, shut it, you daft waffle! ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524125658im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
